Doc: A formula for computing a complex derivative from partial derivatives. Its value is the sum of the terms divided by the product of the denominator terms.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A formula for computing a complex derivative from partial derivatives. Its value is the sum of the terms divided by the product of the denominator terms.
 #/
record FpML5.recordkeeping.DerivativeFormula {
  # A term of the formula. Its value is the product of the its coefficient and the referenced partial derivatives.
  term : FpML5.recordkeeping.FormulaTerm?

  # A denominator term of the formula. Its value is (sum of weighted partials) ^ power.
  denominatorTerm : FpML5.recordkeeping.DenominatorTerm?

}

term.Doc: A term of the formula. Its value is the product of the its coefficient and the referenced partial derivatives.
term.Name: term

denominatorTerm.Doc: A denominator term of the formula. Its value is (sum of weighted partials) ^ power.
denominatorTerm.Name: denominatorTerm
